title: r/Tifu By Buying a DNA Kit For My Boyfriend's Family
description: r/Tifu In today's episode, OP thought it would be fun to buy a DNA test for her boyfriend. Well, it turns out that her boyfriend isn't related to his dad... which means that his mom cheated! This leads to the boyfriend looking for his real biological father and finding a lot more than he bargained for. If you enjoyed this episode, follow for more daily Reddit content!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
